name: 郭忠義
objective: 本課程主要教學目標為教導學生瞭解構成現代電腦之各項組成元素，包含：資料表示法：定點系統 (fixed point system)，浮點系統 (floating point system)，2. 運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3. 指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計 (hardwired control)，微程式控制單元設計 (microprogramming)，4. 記憶系統：記憶體之層次 (memory hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統 (virtual memory)，快速記憶 (cache memory)。
schedule:
1. Computer Abstractions and Technology (3 weeks)
2. Instructions: Language of the Machine (4-5 weeks)
Midterm Exam (1 week)
3. Arithmetic for Computers (2 weeks)
4. The Processor: Datapath and Control(5 weeks)
5. Exploiting Memory Hierarchy (some part, possibly 1 week)
Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework Assignments, Quizzes, and Course participation: 20%, every 2-3 weeks
Mid-term Exam: 40%
Final Exam: 40%
materials:
David A. Patterson and John L. Hennessy, “Computer Organization and Design: The Hardware / Software Interface”, 5th Ed., Morgan Kaufmann, 2013, 亞洲版.
(ISBN: 978-986-6052-67-5, 東華書局代理.)
